flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A huge candy that is packed with energy. When given
to a Pokémon at Lv. 60 or higher, it will increase
that Pokémon’s Defense stat.

A huge candy that is packed with energy. When given
